# accessibilityPerformPick()

**Instance Method**

Selects the accessibility element.

## Declaration

```swift
func accessibilityPerformPick() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the action was successfully triggered; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. This method does not indicate the success or failure of the action, just the fact that the action was successfully triggered.

## Discussion

Use this method on selectable elements, such as a menu item.

## Selecting elements

- **accessibilityPerformPress()**: Simulates clicking the accessibility element.
title: accessibilityPerformPick()
